title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
2. Fry pancetta until crispy, then add garlic.
3. Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
4. Toss spaghetti with pancetta and garlic, then mix with egg mixture.
5. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
